comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: New York's Consolidated Stock Exchange was a rival to the dominant New York Stock Exchange from Consolidated's founding in 1885 to its demise in 1926. www.nber.org/papers/w12343.pdf

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: artolog: Thanks for the backstory on this other exchange. We will add a few more details to the record.
